title: 80/139/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 January 1980 refusing to accept the scientific character of the apparatus described as 'Hewlett-Packard computing calculator, model HP 9825A'
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 11 January 1980  refusing to accept the scientific character of the apparatus described as "Hewlett-Packard computing calculator, model HP 9825A"  (80/139/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Hewlett-Packard computing calculator, model HP 9825A" is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 January 1980.
For the Commission
Ătienne DAVIGNON
Member of the Commission  (1)OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
